8D2FFB281FAD4894A119C72CAF539B44.description: Use foreign languages in conducting research for knowledge/ various data from the media and different learning sources for further education and livelihood.

C323B0A6E10E4C35B43E035167349379.description: Usage of foreign languages as basic tools for further education, livelihood and exchange of learning with the world community.

7C209DB1C59D4753AE45C49B1F758877.description: Use language for communication in real situations/ simulated situations in the classroom and in school.

B2909B4CFCAB484887F045BA76C714D3.description: Ability to use foreign languages in various situations in school, community and society.

E316C0F266824378AACCE83B0E895BC4.description: Search for, collect and summarise the data/facts related to other learning areas from learning sources, and present them through speaking/writing.

2EC436F6BE224F37B79D6C97060CC49D.description: Usage of foreign languages to link knowledge with other learning areas, as foundation for further development and to seek knowledge and widen one's world view.

1DB84A79F2BC4F338B39BF0D38142EDF.description: Compare similarities and differences between the festivals, celebrations, important days and lifestyles of native speakers and those of  Thais.

EC713513D72F42D89AE609B4881A315D.description: Tell differences and similarities between pronunciation of various kinds of sentences, use of punctuation marks and word order in accordance with the structures of sentences in foreign languages and Thai language.

25A773D24A3E4D00AAA1B81ACA6969F2.description: Appreciation of similarities and differences between language and culture of native and Thai speakers, and capacity for accurate and appropriate use of language.

9293D96D96BE43A286825EBC33303E91.description: Participate in language and cultural activities in accordance with their interests.

E6AE6D993D05480499B7CAEAB45917FA.description: Describe the festivals, important days, lifestyles and traditions of native speakers.

E733EFFA446A4BE48F9BC0FE25282C26.description: Use language, tone of voice, gestures and manners politely and appropriately by observing social manners and culture of native speakers.

D6236772EAF24999BB624D3CFB48D1AE.description: Appreciation of the relationship between language and culture of native speakers and capacity for use of language appropriate to occasions and places.

353E9452384A4F5CB566C742F7EA4398.description: Speak/write to express opinions about activities or various matters around them as well as provide brief justifications.

D6CA8626551545D6A3A722A06EA3AC6F.description: Speak/ write to summarise the main idea/theme identified from analysis of matters/incidents of interest to society.

62A2F441E7B7403AAA0C3FB364718F71.description: Speak and write to describe themselves, their daily routines, experiences and the environment around them.

7BDE88148CDF4600A8632BFD1861E888.description: Ability to present data, information, concepts and views about various matters through speaking and writing.

6C1AF3D6CB4E49AAA5E31DA546F09A2F.description: Speak and write to express their own feelings and opinions about various matters around them, various activities, as well as provide brief justifications appropriately.

A7272E2486594838856B77CD83CAB5F2.description: Speak and write appropriately to ask for and give data and express opinions about what has been heard or read.

672B30A3A7B0426D8A8C8923846EC250.description: Speak and write appropriately to express needs, ask for help and agree and refuse to give help in various situations.

C723232AF0DC4BA79846BE01119952E8.description: Use requests and give instructions and clarifications according to the situation.

D514AF53194843A2868EB280454E0513.description: Converse to exchange data about themselves, various activities and situations in daily life.

A86CCC3C69ED4AA4AF3D03B976827618.description: Endowment with language communication skills for exchange of data and information; efficient expression of feelings and opinions.

D783C1A0F0E743929708B31C53FCFD29.description: Specify the topic and main idea and answer questions from listening to and reading dialogues, tales and short stories.

1B83B7F354354ED0B0770CF6A501B486.description: Choose/specify the sentences and texts related to non-text information read.

18F5B9FA136D49ADADB8B17797097AF7.description: Accurately read aloud texts, tales and short poems by observing the principles of reading.

E5140DB1D7DB43F0961153B8DAE7D296.description: Act in compliance with orders requests, instructions and simple explanations heard and read.

B4525329C0254B6D8FD7EBB4F70BFC58.description: Understanding of and capacity to interpret what has been heard and read from various types of media, and ability to express opinions with proper reasoning.
